= Build Instructions =

<ol>
<li> Download and install iPhone SDK >= 2.1
<li> Download ffmpeg from svn (replace -r16838 with the revision you want)

{{{
svn checkout svn://svn.ffmpeg.org/ffmpeg/trunk -rr16838 ffmpeg
}}}

<li> Use a configure script from the Download section

{{{
patch -p4 -i ffmpeg4iphone-svn-2009-30-01-v0.0.4.patch
./configure-iphone-v0.0.4
}}}
